items.content_html: ShieldBearer is a lightweight JavaScript library for seamless JSON Web Token (JWT) handling. This minimalistic library provides essential methods to sign, decode, and validate tokens effortlessly. With SwiftTokenJS, simplify your JWT operations without unnecessary complexity, ensuring efficient and secure data transmission in your applications.
items.title: exagonsoft/ShieldBearer: ShieldBearer is a lightweight JavaScript library for seamless JSON Web Token (JWT) handling. This minimalistic library provides essential methods to sign, decode, and validate tokens effortlessly. With SwiftTokenJS, simplify your JWT operations without unnecessary complexity, ensuring efficient and secure data transmission in your applications.
